text: Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of artificial intelligence in Birmingham, for all.
www.abacustechnologies.com

Abacus Technologies is the sister company of BMSS Advisors & CPAs.
BMSS (founded in 1991 by Keith Barfield, Don Murphy, and John Shank) built a reputation for excellence and innovation.
Client demand for tech-driven solutions led to the creation of Abacus Technologies in 1999.

I changed my behavior.
But what happens when it isn’t that easy?
Changing Your Behavior to Use AI
We need to be motivated to change our behavior.
AI Browsers
But let’s start with our behavior.
It will help us with AI browsers, and whatever comes next.

Two things drive behavior change.
1. What’s the “why?”
2. What’s the friction to switch to the new behavior?
new benefit - friction = perceived value

new benefit - friction = perceived value
Related to the why

some benefit - high friction = low value
Great benefit - low friction = great value

So, how do we increase perceived value?
How do we get past the breakeven point?

We get clear about the “why.”
We reduce friction.
great benefit - low friction = great value
AI Browsers
We should start with the why, but…

With new technology, there is an awareness problem.
You can’t use what you don’t know about.
So, let’s start with a demo!

A word of caution…
Whenever you are using agents that have access to your data, monitor its actions.

Benefits?
Saved time.
Better quality work.

Go deeper…
What will you do with the saved time?
Why does higher quality work matter?
We need to be motivated to change our behavior.

But as you get started,
Get clear about the “why.”
Reduce friction.
Great benefit - low friction = great value
